name: Can You Take Care of This?
name_original: Can You Take Care of This?
description:
CYTCT is a collection of microgames where the player takes care of things! Clean up around the house, practice self-care, or help other people out. 

Mouse controls only.
GAME NOTES:
The cursor in the painting microgame is technically in the center of the brush. Don't move the mouse all the way to the right to click the button
The two plant microgames got confused. You need to move the plant into the sunlight in the "hydrate my son" one
